column1: Little Goat Diner////Hipster vibe. Order cinnamon rolls as soon as you sit down or plan on going very early.  If they're so great
column2: why not make more???  I hate that type of "supply and demand" game to get you in.  If this was a tiny little restaurant
column4: this was definitely large enough that they should be able to bake enough cinnamon rolls.  They also have 3 other restaurants (different styles) to use for baking. My Shrimp n' Grits were to die to for & that is why wIll
